name: Impossible Wheel
description:
The Impossible Wheel is is the perfect casual game.
It is very easy to pick up, but yet insanely addictive.

Impossible Wheel is a side-scrolling and rolling platform.
Guide a small ball on a dangerous mission, be careful, the curved road ahead is extremely challenging.
Some might even say it’s impossible to master!

FEATURES:
- Retro graphics
- Almost impossible level
- Challenging and addictive gameplay

Enjoy and remember! You have been warned!
